entries.seller_success: Your auction of %TO has been sold to %TT for %DI credits
entries.seller_fail: Your auction of %TO has been completed and has not been purchased.
entries.buyer_success: You have won the auction of "%TO" from "%TT" for %DI credits.  See the attached waypoint for location.
entries.buyer_canceled: The auction of "%TO" that you were bidding on has been canceled by %TT.
entries.bidder_outbid: You have been outbid on the "%TO" that you were bidding on.
entries.item_expired: Because you failed to pick it up in time, the "%TO" that you were auctioning has expired.
entries.seller_success_location: The sale took place at %TT, on %TO.
entries.buyer_success_location: The sale took place at %TT, on %TO.
entries.vendor_status_empty: %TO is now empty.  If this vendor is listed on the planetary ad campaign, it will be removed from the overhead map.  If this vendor remains empty for a period of time, you will receive another warning and eventually it will be removed from the game.
entries.vendor_status_unaccessed: %TO has not been used in quite some time.  You should place an item for sale on your vendor soon to prevent the vendor from being removed from the game.
entries.vendor_status_endangered: %TO is in danger of being removed from the game.   You should place an item for sale on it to ensure that it does not get removed from the game.
entries.vendor_status_deleted: Your vendor was deleted from the game due to inactivity or lack of available items to sell.
